title: [Large-Scale] Learner-Generated Comic-Based Science Simulation Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level foundational knowledge in science and experience with digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Current professionals reconstruct science concepts applicable to real-world tasks through visual storytelling, enhancing interactive learning experiences in VR/simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can create digital comic content with a logical flow of three or more steps explaining scientific principles
Learners provide formative assessment feedback demonstrating over 80% comprehension during peer evaluation via created comics
Learners can reproduce scientific problem-solving processes with over 70% accuracy using comic content in VR simulation environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
